It's still hitting me all at once. It's something I've been waiting for a long Tim Hardawaye and to finally get it is something special. The 76ers won the best-of-five series from Orlando, 3-1, and will meet the IndIan M. St Georgea Pacers in the second round, beginning Monday in IndIan M. book details the behind-the-scenes stories of Michael Vick 's surviving dogs and the influence, resilience, dedication and commitment of the animal behavior experts, animal-care groups, lawyers and government officials that united to save them. Alastair Campbell , Tony Blair 's former communications chief whose own tabloid background has often led him to be compared to Andy Coulson , used Twitter to decry: Dreadful news management by David Cameron 's team. But Mr. Alastair Campbell may not be recognizing another clich of spin-doctoring: today was`` a good day to bury bad news.'' killed in Abidjan IVORY Coast strongman Laurent Gbagbo today slapped a nighttime curfew on a swathe of Abidjan largely loyal to his rival for the presidency where at least 11 people have died in two days of unrest. The districts of Abobo and Anyama are under curfew from 7pm to 6am until Saturday, said a decree read out on state television amid worsening tensions in the deadly stand-off pitting Gbagbo against rival Alassane Ouattara . The Times begins its story with Donald Rumsfeld 's account about being told by George W. Bush two weeks after the 9/11 attacks, to prepare review the Pentagon's plans for a war with Iraq. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called`` adult supervision'' for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,
